rows.label: tev900493_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hail, my friend!
You are a long way from home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0020
rows.name:
Hmm... Perhaps it is fate that you
appear before me when you do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0030
rows.name: Would it trouble you to hear me out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0040
rows.name:
Historically, war is to Wroth our livelihood.
We live in full, proud recognition of our
martial prowess and accomplishments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0050
rows.name:
But there have been voices of late among
the younger generations, calling out this
way of life as backward and anachronistic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0060
rows.name:
With each day that passes since the gates
of NLA first opened to us, these voices
grow ever louder and more numerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0070
rows.name:
Naturally, the hardened older warriors feel
anger and resentment toward the young.
It disrespects our traditions, they say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0080
rows.name: And hence, my question to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0090
rows.name: As their leader, with whom should my favor lie...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0100
rows.name: Speak for the Young

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0110
rows.name: Assert that change is a chance to grow.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0120
rows.name:
A very Earth-like answer. Your people
have gone so far as to trade their fleshly
bodies for clever mechanical ones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0130
rows.name:
Yet if courage in the face of change be the
wellspring of your power, then perhaps
there is some wisdom in your counsel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0140
rows.name: Support the Old

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0150
rows.name:
Insist that tradition is important
above all else.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0160
rows.name:
Hah! I did not expect such words to
come from you, my human friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0170
rows.name:
You mean to say that Wroth's proud
pedigree and tradition is what made us
Wrothians, and what defines us even still?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0180
rows.name: Advise Restraint

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0190
rows.name: Caution that he should stay out of it.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0200
rows.name:
You presume to admonish me, human?
Has your will to live abandoned you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0210
rows.name:
...And yet, your counsel is most wise.
If our roles were reversed, I may well have
said the same to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0220
rows.name:
I shall remember your frank advice.
Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0230
rows.name:
...What is the matter? Is it so unexpected
that I would seek out your opinion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0240
rows.name: Hah... Perhaps it is so, indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0250
rows.name:
Were I but a warlord, butchering my
enemies in combat as the supreme leader
of Wroth, I may not have thought to do so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0260
rows.name:
But I am all that remains of the royal line,
and I have a duty to lead my people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0270
rows.name:
The bitter decision to enter the Ganglion's
service, our sworn enemy though they be,
stemmed also from that duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0280
rows.name:
I must put the greatest emphasis on my
people's happiness and well-being.
My personal feelings are largely irrelevant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0290
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0300
rows.name: Tell him he's doing a great job.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0310
rows.name:
...Coming from anyone else,
I would dismiss such trifling platitudes
with barely a tail-twitch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0320
rows.name:
But from you, they seem to come
from the heart. Mysterious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0330
rows.name: Pledge Allegiance

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0340
rows.name:
Say you hope one day to be counted
among his retainers.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0350
rows.name:
A human retainer...
An interesting idea, especially considering
how skilled you are as a warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0360
rows.name:
I shall employ you to train the assembled
forces of Wroth, and have you take them
on all at once! Aha ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_JNK0370
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: tev900493_SEL0380
rows.name:
Warn him that a prince cannot
afford to appear weak.

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0390
rows.name: Hmph... Stern words, these.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0400
rows.name:
But do not worry.
I am not yet so reduced in stature that
I would bare my heart to just anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0410
rows.name:
I addressed the earlier question to you
because you have no prejudices regarding
the matter. That is all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0420
rows.name:
...I may have said too much.
Please, let none know what
we discussed here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900493_MSG0430
rows.name:
And should the chance present itself,
let us speak again. ...My favored foe.[ST:wait ]
